summary: pink boots for the pink miniskirt http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=585
descriptionHtml:
An easily installed pink boot.
They are meant to be worn with:
pink miniskirt http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=585

It\'s a retexture of the Tavern Boots worn by Hroki who is in Markarth at the main square at the entrance or inside the inn.
Only the color is changed 

Unzip this file here:
%your steam directory%\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\clothes\\wench

That\'s all

After that, next (re)start of skyrim it should work.

The item can be added to your inventory this way:

pres the `/~ key on keyboard to go to console 
enter this line: player.additem 000D1921 1
pres the `/~ key

to add them to a companion:
pres the `/~ key on keyboard to go to console 
click on your companion
enter this line: additem 000D1921 1
pres the `/~ key

The boots can be enchanted.

caution: all female Tavern boots will now look like this
author: stroot
